text:
**Name**: Creamy Tomato Chicken

**Ingredient List**: 1 lb Chicken Breast, 1 (28 ounce) can Tomato Sauce, 1 cup plain Yoghurt, 1 tsp dried oregano, 1/2 tsp garlic powder, Salt and pepper to taste.

**Instruction List**: 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 2. Cut chicken breast into 1-inch cubes. 3. In a large bowl, combine chicken, tomato sauce, yoghurt, oregano, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Mix well. 4. Pour mixture into a greased baking dish. 5. Bake for 30-40 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and sauce is bubbly.


**Name**: Tuna Lettuce Wraps

**Ingredient List**: 6 oz Fresh Tuna, 2 cups chopped Lettuce, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 1 tbsp lemon juice, Salt and pepper to taste.

**Instruction List**: 1.  Drain any excess liquid from the tuna.  2. Flake tuna into a bowl. 3. Add mayonnaise and lemon juice. Mix gently. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Spoon tuna salad into lettuce cups.


**Name**: Black Eyed Pea Salad

**Ingredient List**: 1 (15 ounce) can Black Eyed Peas, 1/2 cup chopped red onion, 1/4 cup chopped Fresh red pepper, 1/4 cup chopped cilantro, 2 tbsp lime juice, 1 tbsp olive oil, Salt and pepper to taste.

**Instruction List**: 1. Drain and rinse black eyed peas. 2. In a medium bowl, combine black eyed peas, red onion, red pepper, and cilantro. 3. In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper. 4. Pour dressing over the black eyed pea mixture and toss to combine.  5. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.


**Name**: Spicy Tuna and Pepper Stir-fry

**Ingredient List**: 6 oz Fresh Tuna, 1 Fresh red pepper (sliced), 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tsp sriracha (or to taste), 1 clove garlic (minced), Sesame seeds (optional, for garnish).

**Instruction List**: 1. Heat olive oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. 2. Add sliced red pepper and garlic, stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until slightly softened. 3. Add tuna and stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes, until cooked through. 4. Stir in soy sauce and sriracha.  5. Serve hot, garnished with sesame seeds (optional).
